name: Monstrous Gambit [Left side]
description:
Mogstrom versus Gasenberg Round 2 replaying Kasparov's Immortal“

This is a collaborative Battle Non Fungible Token created by Kenobi [USA] and Crain Garden [Russia], minted on 2021\JULI\23
This is the [Left] part. For the complete match please search "Monstrous Gambit [Right side]" from Crain Garden.

"Monstrous Gambit" is a homage to Kasparov vs. Topalov, Wijk aan Zee 1999. 
Despite losing a historic match against the computer program Deep Blue two years earlier, Garry Kasparov remained in his tournaments by a wide margin in 1999 and set a new Elo rating record (2851). Kasparov has quite a few beautiful games in his career, but this one is an indisputable masterpiece. This game is amazing from start to finish. 24. Rxd4 !!, 25. Re7+ !! and 36. Bf1 !! It's full of incredible inspiration !!
